member.name: N:StockGames
member.summary: StockGames The root namespace for the StockGames application.

member.name: N:StockGames.CommunicationModule
member.summary: StockGames.CommunicationModule Contains the communication module implementation.

member.name: N:StockGames.CommunicationModule.EVWriters
member.summary: StockGames.CommunicationModule.EVWriters Contains the specific EV file writers for simulation models.

member.name: N:StockGames.CommunicationModule.Parsers
member.summary: StockGames.CommunicationModule.Parsers Contains the specific parsers for simulation models.

member.name: N:StockGames.Controllers
member.summary: StockGames.Controllers Contains application controllers for the project.

member.name: N:StockGames.Entities
member.summary: StockGames.Entities Contains entities that are used for DataServices and some ViewModels.

member.name: N:StockGames.Messaging
member.summary: StockGames.Messaging Contains implementations of MessageTypes used for messaging in the application.

member.name: N:StockGames.Missions
member.summary: StockGames.Missions Contains the necessary classes for the core of the Missions Module.

member.name: N:StockGames.Persistence.V1
member.summary: StockGames.Persistence.V1 Contains version 1 of the Persistence module. Future code may require major data changes may require that version 1 becomes obsolete, to allow for application upgrades using existing data.

member.name: N:StockGames.Persistence.V1.DataModel
member.summary: StockGames.Persistence.V1.DataModel Contains DataModels and other code required for database persistence.

member.name: N:StockGames.Persistence.V1.Migrations
member.summary: StockGames.Persistence.V1.Migrations Contains data migration code. This is used to control data migrations after an app is deployed on the app.

member.name: N:StockGames.Persistence.V1.Services
member.summary: StockGames.Persistence.V1.Services Contains the data services. All database related code reading or modifing data in the database must use methods provided by the data services.

member.name: N:StockGames.Resources
member.summary: StockGames.Resources Contains localization resources for the application.

member.name: N:StockGames.ViewModels
member.summary: StockGames.ViewModels Contains all of the ViewModels needed for the Views.

member.name: N:StockGames.Views
member.summary: StockGames.Views Contains all of the Views used for the GUI.
